page.title: 12 Newtown Area
page.content: About 50% of the houses are flats and council houses and the rest are privately owned. Many of the privately owned houses are between 60 and 80 years old. The flats and council houses are up to 40 years old although some have been recently constructed during the last decade. Many of the adults who we asked what they do for entertainment said that they just stay in and watch television. Others said that they go to the local pub for a pint. When the teenagers were asked what they did for entertainment about 30% of them said that they either wandered about the playground or stayed in and watched T.V.. Children aged between five and twelve just play in their garden or stay in to watch T.V.
